   [체코웨이]

- Checkoway, S., Maskiewicz, J., Garman, C., Fried, J., Cohney, S., Green, M., Heninger, N., Weinmann, R., Rescorla, E. 및 H. Shacham , "A Systematic Analysis of the Juniper Dual EC Incident", 2016 ACM SIGSAC Conference on Computer and Communications Security 회의록 - CCS '16, DOI 10.1145/2976749.2978395, 2016년 10월.
